LimitType.description:
Specifies the type of risk management limit. 
       Bilateral, NetBilateral, IndirectBilateral, Global, MandatoryBilateral, DiscretionaryBilateral, DirectDebit, SingleCustomerDirectDebit, SingleFinancialInstitutionDirectDebit, TotalDailyCustomerDirectDebit, TotalDailyFinancialInstitutionDirectDebit, AutoCollateralisation, UnsecuredCredit, ExternalGuarantee, Revolving, NotRevolving.
